snippet: Many factors can skew the quality and quantity of crowd-sourced comments.
abstract: Study to analyze how outside factors affect crowd-sourced review sites finds that size and racial makeup of a city, price of a meal and even weather can skew the quality and quantity of online restaurant reviews; also finds that some regions of the country are more prolific in their online reviewing habits than others.
lead_paragraph: Many factors can skew the quality and quantity of crowd-sourced comments.

headline.main: Online Reviews? Keep This in Mind
headline.print_headline: Online Reviews? Keep This in Mind
